# MeshConvexDecompositionSettings

**Inherits:** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Parameters to be used with a [Mesh](Mesh.md) convex decomposition operation.

## Property Descriptions

<a id="MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_convex_hull_approximation"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **convex_hull_approximation** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_convex_hull_approximation)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_convex_hull_approximation**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_convex_hull_approximation**\ (\ )

If ``true``, uses approximation for computing convex hulls.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_convex_hull_downsampling"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **convex_hull_downsampling** = `4` [ðŸ”—](#MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_convex_hull_downsampling)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_convex_hull_downsampling**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_convex_hull_downsampling**\ (\ )

Controls the precision of the convex-hull generation process during the clipping plane selection stage. Ranges from ``1`` to ``16``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_max_concavity"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **max_concavity** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_max_concavity)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_max_concavity**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_max_concavity**\ (\ )

Maximum concavity. Ranges from ``0.0`` to ``1.0``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_max_convex_hulls"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **max_convex_hulls** = `1` [ðŸ”—](#MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_max_convex_hulls)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_max_convex_hulls**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_max_convex_hulls**\ (\ )

The maximum number of convex hulls to produce from the merge operation.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_max_num_vertices_per_convex_hull"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **max_num_vertices_per_convex_hull** = `32` [ðŸ”—](#MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_max_num_vertices_per_convex_hull)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_max_num_vertices_per_convex_hull**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_max_num_vertices_per_convex_hull**\ (\ )

Controls the maximum number of triangles per convex-hull. Ranges from ``4`` to ``1024``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_min_volume_per_convex_hull"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **min_volume_per_convex_hull** = `0.0001` [ðŸ”—](#MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_min_volume_per_convex_hull)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_min_volume_per_convex_hull**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_min_volume_per_convex_hull**\ (\ )

Controls the adaptive sampling of the generated convex-hulls. Ranges from ``0.0`` to ``0.01``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Mode](MeshConvexDecompositionSettings.md#enum_MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_Mode) **mode** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_mode**\ (\ value\: [Mode](MeshConvexDecompositionSettings.md#enum_MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_Mode)\ )
- [Mode](MeshConvexDecompositionSettings.md#enum_MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_Mode) **get_mode**\ (\ )

Mode for the approximate convex decomposition.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_normalize_mesh"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **normalize_mesh** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_normalize_mesh)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_normalize_mesh**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_normalize_mesh**\ (\ )

If ``true``, normalizes the mesh before applying the convex decomposition.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_plane_downsampling"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **plane_downsampling** = `4` [ðŸ”—](#MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_plane_downsampling)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_plane_downsampling**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_plane_downsampling**\ (\ )

Controls the granularity of the search for the "best" clipping plane. Ranges from ``1`` to ``16``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_project_hull_vertices"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **project_hull_vertices** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_project_hull_vertices)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_project_hull_vertices**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_project_hull_vertices**\ (\ )

If ``true``, projects output convex hull vertices onto the original source mesh to increase floating-point accuracy of the results.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_resolution"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **resolution** = `10000` [ðŸ”—](#MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_resolution)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_resolution**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_resolution**\ (\ )

Maximum number of voxels generated during the voxelization stage.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_revolution_axes_clipping_bias"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **revolution_axes_clipping_bias** = `0.05` [ðŸ”—](#MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_revolution_axes_clipping_bias)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_revolution_axes_clipping_bias**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_revolution_axes_clipping_bias**\ (\ )

Controls the bias toward clipping along revolution axes. Ranges from ``0.0`` to ``1.0``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_symmetry_planes_clipping_bias"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **symmetry_planes_clipping_bias** = `0.05` [ðŸ”—](#MeshConvexDecompositionSettings_property_symmetry_planes_clipping_bias)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_symmetry_planes_clipping_bias**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_symmetry_planes_clipping_bias**\ (\ )

Controls the bias toward clipping along symmetry planes. Ranges from ``0.0`` to ``1.0``.
